about_the_game:
Synopsis


On a rainy night, Max finds himself in front of his desk immersed in his drawings as usual, he has difficulty stopping, bewitched by this obsession to recreate the creatures that haunts him in his head. He eventually gave in to fatigue and found his bed. The next day, he sees a stranger through his window who seems to be spying on him and decides to pursue him through the forest behind his home. What he has no idea is that he is about to find himself in a conflict that endangers the survival of mankind, and even worse, he is the only person with the power to postpone balance in the universe.

Universe


A young man discovers that the creatures of his imagination actually exist. They are called Creas and live on a planet called Ostral. The problem is, the Creas mysteriously teleport to Earth. He will then discover the secrets of an ancient civilization which would be the creators of humans as well as the Creas, they are called the Husters, named Creator by the Creas. Max is part of this lineage, he will have to discover the reason why these creations suddenly appear on Earth and that he will have to preserve the balance between these 2 races.

Characters


Nom: Max
Clan: Husters
Role:Max is a Creator, he will have to put a theme to the disaster that touches the Earth and the Creas.

Description: Despite my young age, I am mature, determined and I have a good general knowledge. I have no training and prefer to avoid confrontations. However, I am able to defend myself if necessary.

Nom: Darkeris
Clan: Lidam
Role: Darkeris will assist Max for much of his adventure and help him face the worst dangers.

Description: Leader of Lidam, Darkeris is a fighter with a calm temperament whose best asset is his agility. He has extensive knowledge of close combat techniques, including weapon handling.

Nom:unknown, nicknamed the Master

Clan: None
Role: The Master is the main advisor of the Husters, like Max, he will guide him in his quest.
Description: He reigns over the Consejo, ancestral tower and court of Ostral, where justice is administered. Not much is known about him, but he is still respected by the people of Ostral for his wisdom and good intentions.

Nom: Redrius
Clan: Evhir
Role: Encountered during the journey, he rejoins the hero until he feels the moment for him to return home.

Description: Redrius, along with his brothers, are the toughest and the most unruly of Creas in Evhir. In addition to his incredible physical strength, Redrius possesses the ability to ignite fire.

Nom: Lasnah
Clan: Civres
Role: Also encountered during the journey, she will have to be persuaded that her help could be of great help by the time she returns home.
Description: Lasnah reigns in the forest of Civres on Ostral. She is very protective of her offspring and her habitat. She does not hesitate to punish those who upset her by using her vegetal powers.

Nom: Spiroat
Clan: Evhir
Role: Appeared by chance, a misfortune will happen to him and Max will have to put his thoughts in abundance to save him.

Description: Spiroat is a big, sturdy lizard who likes to mistreat the weakest. He uses his volcanic powers to defeat his opponents.

Gameplay

Menu

The menu has been revised to look like a digital music player (Ipod), we find all the basic functions, except the equipment which is managed automatically, but also the objectives (Quests), Karma (Impact of moral choices) and even successes (Successes).

Combat

The combat system is turn-based. A rune system is included, it will be used to heal or revive the hero during combat as well as to use bonuses that will improve the hero's stats. It is by attacking that the hero will fulfill the power of the rune that corresponds to his element.

By defending himself, he will be able to refill his energy which is used for the use of skills.

Diversity

Creas also includes several other gameplay elements (Mini-games) which will change depending on the situations Max encounters. A racing system has been added

Choice

During the game, the player will have to make moral choices (Karma) which will sometimes affect the story as well as Max's strengths and weaknesses.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP/2000
  • Processor: PC with 800MHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution in High Color mode
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP/2000
  • Processor: PC with 1.5GHz Intel® Pentium® 4
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution in True Color mode
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

short_description: Creas is a contemporary/fantasy RPG that tells the story of a young man discovering the existence of creatures from his imagination. He now finds himself in a conflict that threatens the fate of humanity and he is the only hope for his survival…
